commands.name: Check Status
commands.description: View changes in your working directory

commands.name: Create Branch
commands.description: Create and switch to new branch

commands.name: Create & Switch Branch
commands.description: Create a new branch and switch to it

commands.name: Commit with Message
commands.description: Commit staged changes with a custom message

commands.name: Push to Branch
commands.description: Push commits to a specific remote branch

commands.name: Pull from Branch
commands.description: Pull changes from a specific remote branch

commands.name: Git Merge Branch
commands.description: Merge specified branch into current branch

commands.name: Git Rebase
commands.description: Rebase current branch onto specified branch

parameters.name: package
parameters.description: Package name to add as dev dependency

commands.name: Run Custom Script
commands.description: Run a custom script defined in package.json

parameters.name: bump
parameters.description: Version bump type: patch, minor, major

commands.name: Build Custom Image
commands.description: Build a Docker image with custom name

parameters.name: name
parameters.validationMessage: Image name can only contain letters, numbers, dots, hyphens, and underscores

commands.name: Run Custom Container
commands.description: Run a Docker container on a custom port

parameters.name: port
parameters.validationMessage: Port must be a number between 1-65535

commands.name: Execute Shell
commands.description: Execute shell in a running container

commands.name: Pull Image
commands.description: Pull an image from Docker Hub

commands.name: Get Pod Logs
commands.description: View logs from a specific pod

parameters.name: replicas
parameters.validationMessage: Replicas must be a positive number

commands.name: Port Forward
commands.description: Forward local port to pod port

commands.name: Disk Usage
commands.description: Show disk usage in human-readable format

commands.name: Copy File
commands.description: Copy a file to a new location

commands.name: Search Text
commands.description: Search for text within a file

commands.name: Remove Directory
commands.description: Remove directory and all its contents (WARNING: irreversible)

parameters.name: script
parameters.validationMessage: File must be a Python script (.py)

commands.name: Cargo Run
commands.description: Build and run the Rust project

commands.name: Go Run
commands.description: Build and run a Go file

commands.name: Go Vet
commands.description: Examine Go source code for errors

commands.name: Terraform State List
commands.description: List all resources in Terraform state

commands.name: Terraform Import
commands.description: Import existing infrastructure into Terraform state

commands.name: AWS Configure
commands.description: Set up AWS credentials and config

commands.name: S3 List Contents
commands.description: List contents of an S3 bucket

commands.name: S3 Sync
commands.description: Sync a local directory to S3

commands.name: ECR Login
commands.command: aws ecr get-login-password | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin {registry}

commands.name: Flutter Run
commands.description: Run the Flutter app on a connected device

parameters.name: package
parameters.description: Package name from pub.dev (e.g., provider, riverpod)

commands.name: Maven Package
commands.description: Build and package the Maven project

commands.name: Maven Install
commands.description: Install artifact to local Maven repository

commands.name: Maven Clean Install
commands.description: Clean then install the Maven project

commands.name: SSH Connect
commands.description: Connect to a remote server via SSH

commands.name: SSH with Key
commands.description: Connect to remote server with specific SSH key

commands.name: SSH with Port
commands.description: Connect to remote server on a custom port

commands.name: SCP Upload
commands.description: Copy a file to a remote server

commands.name: SCP Download
commands.description: Copy a file from a remote server

commands.name: Rsync to Remote
commands.description: Sync local directory to remote server

commands.name: Rsync from Remote
commands.description: Sync files from remote server to local

commands.name: Generate SSH Key
commands.description: Generate a new ED25519 SSH key pair

commands.name: Copy SSH Key
commands.description: Copy SSH public key to remote server

commands.name: TypeScript Check
commands.description: Run TypeScript type checking without emitting

commands.name: Jest Watch
commands.description: Run Jest tests in watch mode

commands.name: Jest Coverage
commands.description: Run Jest tests with coverage report

commands.name: Jest File
commands.description: Run tests in a specific file

commands.name: Package Extension
commands.description: Package the extension into a .vsix file

parameters.name: version
parameters.validationMessage: Version must be in semver format (e.g., 1.2.3)

commands.name: List Packaged Files
commands.description: List all files included in the .vsix package

commands.name: Login to Marketplace
commands.description: Login with your VS Code Marketplace publisher name

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Your publisher name on VS Code Marketplace

commands.name: Logout from Marketplace
commands.description: Logout from VS Code Marketplace publisher account

commands.name: Publish to Marketplace
commands.description: Publish the extension to VS Code Marketplace

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Your Open VSX personal access token

commands.name: Install .vsix Locally
commands.description: Install a .vsix file in VS Code locally for testing

commands.name: Package & Install Locally
commands.description: Package and immediately install for testing
